title: Ball Mastery Warm-Up
description: Players work individually on ball touches: inside-inside, sole rolls, toe taps.
coachingPoints: Keep the ball close within one step
progression: Increase speed or make patterns more complex after 3 minutes.

title: 1v1 to Small Goals
description: Players attack and defend in 1v1 duels to small goals in a 10x15 grid.
coachingPoints: Use body feints to unbalance defender
progression: Add gates for defender recovery runs or 2v1 transitions.
